f3.name: Sell Inventory Now
f3.lore:
&7Instantly sell any items in your
&7inventory that can be sold on
&7the Bazaar.

f4.name: &bSell Sacks Now
f4.lore:
&7Instantly sell everything in
&7your sacks on the Bazaar.
